IncludeDraftOrders.description: Ask the user if they want to search for draft orders.
IncludeDraftOrders.prompt: Do you want to include draft orders as well when searching?
IncludeDraftOrders.askAgain: May be the order is not confirmed. Do you want to see if there is a draft order?

actionResponses.failed: I'm sorry. There was an error when searching for orders. Please refine your criteria and try again.
actionResponses.noResultsWithoutDrafts: I didn't find any confirmed or draft order for ${parameters.searchCriteria.Value}.
actionResponses.noResults: I didn't find any confirmed order for ${parameters.searchCriteria.Value}.
searchResult: Here is the most recent order for ${parameters.searchCriteria.Value}:
